com.yantra.api.ydm

Interface closeManifest

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.YDMApi, YIFApi

    public interface closeManifest

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document closeManifest(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The closeManifest API closes a manifest for a carrier.

    • Method Detail

      • closeManifest

        org.w3c.dom.Document closeManifest(YFSEnvironment env,
                                   org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                            throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                   java.rmi.RemoteException

        The closeManifest API closes a manifest for a carrier. A manifest is a carrier-specific document that comprises shipments and loads. This API works off the pipeline. The closeManifest API performs the following tasks:

        • Validation of the input XML
        • Obtains the manifest for the passed input. If its already closed throws exception.
        • Gets the list of the loads for the manifest that haven't left the origin node yet.
        • Calls receiveIntransitUpdates API with LoadLeftOrigin set to 'Y'.
        • If a load is included in a manifest implicitly, all the outermost load containers and outermost shipment containers must be manifested.
        • If a load is included in a manifest explicitly, a manifest including such a load can be closed with no containers.
        • If trailer number is passed then manageLoad API is called with the new trailer number for load.
        • If unable to do the updates on the load, then throws exception.
        • Gets the list of the shipments for the manifest.
        • This shipment list refers to only explicitly included shipments in manifest.
        • Checks all shipments are pack completed. If shipment is already confirmed removes from list.
        • Calls confirmShipmentAPI, for shipments which are not going to break bulk node, with ShipCompleteFlag set to 'Y' and on base transaction CONFIRM_SHIPMENT for the shipments to be confirmed.
        • If unable to confirm any of the shipments, then throws exception.
        • Formulate input to YCS and send it through socket connection.
        • YCS will do its validations and returns success/failure message to YDM.

        Related Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:
        The following user exit is called before calling YCS:
        com.yantra.ydm.integration.ycs.japi.ue.YCSBeforeCloseManifestUE.
        This user exit is invoked only if Carrier Integration is required i.e. if Carrier Service/YCS is used.

        The following user exit is called from YCS:
        com.yantra.ycs.japi.ue.YCScloseManifestUserExit
        This user exit is invoked only if Carrier Integration is required i.e. if Carrier Service/YCS is used.

        Events Raised:
        Raised during the transaction CONFIRM_SHIPMENT.

          ON_SUCCESS:
            This event is raised upon successful execution of confirmShipment.
            Data published - YDM_CONFIRM_SHIPMENT.ON_SUCCESS.xml

        Raised during the transaction CLOSE_MANIFEST.
          ON_SUCCESS:
            This event is raised upon successful execution of closeManifest.
            Data published - YDM_CLOSE_MANIFEST.ON_SUCCESS.xml

            Please note that the (UPS) Print Pickup Summary Label action can now be configured on this ON_SUCCESS event. This will invoke the PrintPickupSummaryLabel service. ReprintCarrierLabel will be invoked with ReprintLabelLevel as PICKUP_SUMMARY. Please refer to JavaDocs for more. This will only work with Sterling Pierbridge Adaptor.

        Audits: None

        Pre-conditions: None

        Post-conditions: None

        Output Template Support: Yes

        Database Extensibility Support: No

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: Yes
        Versions: ver32, ver40 and ver45.

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document that contains details of the manifest to be closed. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
